snippet: These days one of the most frequently asked questions in our house - and often the toughest to answer - is the "Can I go ..." question.
abstract: These days one of the most frequently asked questions in our house - and often the toughest to answer - is the "Can I go ..." question.
lead_paragraph: Last week my almost-14-year-old son, Nathaniel, asked me if I would let him go to a New Year's Eve party. Even though he had yet to be invited to one - plans were still taking shape - he was certain of one thing: He was too old and too cool to hang out at home with his mom, dad and grandma for dinner and a movie to ring in the new year.
